price: İyi bilin ki, göklerde ve yerde olanlar Allah’ındır. İyi bilin ki, Allah’ın vaadi haktır. Fakat onların çoğu bilmez.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alā inna lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi alā inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
